mainMovie.name: Black Panther
mainMovie.synopsis: 'Black Panther' unfolds in the fictional kingdom of Wakanda, hidden in Africa. T'Challa, portrayed by Chadwick Boseman, ascends to the throne after his father's death, becoming the legendary Black Panther. As he strives to protect his people, T'Challa faces challenges that force him to question his role as king and hero. With a blend of advanced technology, rich traditions, and the pursuit of balance, 'Black Panther' captivates with its compelling narrative and powerful representation. A milestone in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, the film celebrates African culture and the strength of identity.

latestReleases.name: Avengers
latestReleases.synopsis: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

latestReleases.name: Guardians of The Galaxy
latestReleases.synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans topurge the universe.

latestReleases.name: Knives Out
latestReleases.synopsis: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

latestReleases.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
latestReleases.synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

latestReleases.name: Tenet
latestReleases.synopsis: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
